title: Chris Langan: The Dumbest “Smartest Man” in the World
description:
There's this guy named Chris Langan who calls himself the smartest man in the world, pretending to have a super awesome theory of everything called the Cognitive-Theoretic Model of the Universe. His interview with Michael Knowles from the Daily Wire has gone quite viral, with lots of people believing that Chris really is a supergenius. Spoiler alert: he isn't. He's just another average intellect grifter pretending to say smart things. Let's break down his dumbest statements together!

Watch all my debunks: http://bit.ly/ProfDaveDebunk
